thread.title: Avnet Supply Chain Executive Lalit Wadhwa to Present at Innovate 2015 P2P Conference
thread.title_full: Avnet Supply Chain Executive Lalit Wadhwa to Present at Innovate 2015 P2P Conference

title: Avnet Supply Chain Executive Lalit Wadhwa to Present at Innovate 2015 P2P Conference
text:
Avnet Supply Chain Executive Lalit Wadhwa to Present at Innovate 2015 P2P Conference [September 10, 2015] Tweet 
Avnet, Inc . (NYSE: AVT ), a leading global technology distributor, today announced that Lalit Wadhwa, vice president, global supply chain operations, will be a featured speaker at the upcoming Innovate 2015 8 th Annual P2P Conference, September 14-16, 2015, at the InterContinental Hotel, New Orleans. In his presentation, "Optimizing Procurement to Support a Digital Supply Chain: A High-Tech Case Study," Wadhwa will discuss the impact of digital technologies on procurement organizations, and how value chain members in the high-tech industry are embracing these technologies. 
Innovate 2015: The Purchase-to-Pay Summit provides professionals in accounts payable, procurement, shared services, supply chain, finance and treasury with P2P best practices in automation, collaboration and process improvement for core back office operations. 
"To benefit from the truly transformative power of digital technology, today's supply chain professionals must understand the difference between a supply chain that is enabled by digital technology and one that fully embraces and integrates digital technology to unite the traditional physical flow of goods with core back office operations, including information technology and finance," said Wadhwa. "My session will focus on the complexity of the transformation, and a roadmap for embracing the digital technologies in order to maximize value creation by procurement oganizations." 
Wadhwa and his team assist Avnet customers to seamlessly move their supply chain from one region of the world to another, across multiple sites. The team also ensures consistent supply chain business processes for global customers across Avnet's regions, and provides customers with a consistent experience, regardless of location. 
To learn more about Innovate 2015, or to register, visit http://innovate.paystreamadvisors.com .
